name: Five Nights At Freddys Sister Location: VR
name_original: Five Nights At Freddys Sister Location: VR
description:
Five Nights at Freddy's: Sister Location in FNaF 5 vernacular is a survival horror quest, the fifth installment in the Five Nights at Freddy's series, developed by game designer Scott Cawthon and released on October 7, 2016 on PC . And I ported the game to virtual helmets for a great atmosphere!

Full Game Video

oculus trailer

  • Steam VR and Steam Client Installed and Open (PCVR Only)
  • A PCVR headset with two controllers (Vive, Oculus, etc.)
  • Room-Scale tracking
  • Minimum System Requirements (Quest)
  • I recommend using a Quest 2 for the Quest port. The game is playable on a Quest 1 but for a better experience, use a Quest 2.
  • Storage: 1+ GB available space
  • Minimum System Requirments (PCVR):
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 or greater / AMD FX 8350 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 / AMD R9 390
  • Storage: 4+ GB available space
